Nu Runtime Documentation

IPointcut Interface

Interface for every pointcut

For a list of all members of this type, see IPointcut Members.

public interface IPointcut

Types that implement IPointcut

Type Description
And An "And" operator composes two pointcuts such that a join point is matched only when it is matched by both pointcuts.
Args Summary description for Args.
Call A Call Pointcut selects each method call join point whose signature matches MethodPattern.
Execution An execution pointcut selects each method execution join point whose signature matches MethodPattern.
NewCall A NewCallPointcut selects each constructor call join point whose signature matches MethodPattern.
NewExecution A NewExecutionPointcut selects each constructor execution join point whose signature matches MethodPattern.
Not A "Not" operator negates a pointcut such that a join point is matched only when it is not matched by the operand pointcut.
Or An "Or" operator composes two pointcuts such that a join point is matched if it is matched by either pointcuts.
Return A return pointcut selects each method return join point whose signature matches MethodPattern.
StaticInitialization A NewExecutionPointcut selects each constructor execution join point whose signature matches MethodPattern.
Target A "Target" pointcut matches every join point when the target executing object is an instance of Type or Id's type.
This A "This" pointcut matches every join point when the currently executing object is an instance of Type or Id's type.

Requirements

Namespace: Nu.Runtime.Pointcut

Assembly: Nu.Runtime (in Nu.Runtime.dll)
